mapper.select: SELECT cmt.comment_id, cmt.content, cmt.created_at, cmt.user_id, cmt.community_id, u.nickname FROM "Comment" cmt JOIN "User" u ON u.user_id = cmt.user_id WHERE cmt.community_id = #{communityId} ORDER BY cmt.comment_id DESC

SELECT cmt.comment_id, cmt.content, cmt.created_at, cmt.user_id, cmt.community_id, u.nickname FROM "Comment" cmt JOIN "User" u ON u.user_id = cmt.user_id WHERE cmt.community_id = #{communityId} ORDER BY cmt.comment_id DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "Comment" (content, created_at, user_id, community_id) VALUES (#{content}, SYSDATE, #{userId}, #{communityId})
mapper.select: SELECT cmt.comment_id, cmt.community_id, cmt.content, cmt.created_at, c.title, c.user_id FROM "Comment" cmt JOIN Community c ON c.community_id = cmt.community_id WHERE cmt.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY cmt.created_at DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{size} ROWS ONLY
